item.title: Quarkus 0.21.2 released
item.description:
We just released Quarkus 0.21.2.

item.title: Quarkus 0.21.1 released
item.description:
We just released Quarkus 0.21.1.
As for 0.20.0, to build native executables, you will need GraalVM 19.1.1.

This release is mostly about fixing bugs and usability issues. The Kafka Streams and Apache Tika extensions got their usability greatly improved for instance.

item.title: Tips to use Hibernate ORM with Quarkus profiles and live coding mode
item.description:
Quarkus live coding (aka dev mode) is really useful for applications that mix front end or services and database access. There are a few common approaches to make the best of it.
